title: Internet of Things (IoT) Cognitive Technology: Advanced Understanding through Case-Based Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented education utilizing VR simulations in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments. Emphasis on problem-solving activities based on real-world cases like agricultural IoT systems

learning_goals: Learners explain processes for resolving uncertain cognitive information in IoT environments using context-aware recognition methods.
Learners design and evaluate intelligent routing and information management systems for agricultural IoT using simulation/VR tools.
Learners integrate diverse sensor data to build IoT cognitive context models and apply them to real-world cases.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
